reference_summary:
{'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Sam Esmail', 'Jim McKay', 'Tricia Brock', 'Deborah Chow', 'Nisha Ganatra', 'Niels Arden Oplev', 'Christoph Schrewe'], 'Producers': ['Sam Esmail', 'Kyle Bradstreet', 'Steve Golin', 'Chad Hamilton'], 'Starring': ['Rami Malek', 'Christian Slater']} Pretty clever plot lines (though not always realistic) and very good acting. Far more interesting than you think a "hacker" drama would be. Definitely R-rated and pushes the limit of that at times. I'll keep watching on Amazon Prime. Better than expected for a hacker drama {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Rob Rapley'], 'Producers': ['Rob Rapley', 'Stephanie Haberman Bordas', 'Kathryn Lord'], 'Starring': ['Michael Murphy', 'Shuler Hensley', 'Kathryn Erbe'], 'Studio': ['PBS']} Lots of info about presidents Garfield and Arthur I never knew. Garfield could have been one of the best presidents ever. Looks like his doctor did more to kill him than the guy who shot him. Good acting in the docu-drama parts. Very engrossing. Well worth your time if you like learning little known history. {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Starring': ['Paul Giamatti', 'Laura Linney', 'Stephen Dilane'], 'Studio': ['HBO']} Johnny A finally gets his due! And Abigail too!
Fantastic acting. Great production quality for a period piece.
Adams, Jefferson, Washington, Hamilton, and Franklin are all here. Entertaining and educational! All the founding fathers excellently portrayed--but Abigail steals the show! {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Bill Condon'], 'Producers': ['Anne Carey', 'Iain Canning', 'Emile Sherman', 'Len Blavatnik', 'Aviv Giladi', 'Vince Holden', 'Christine Langan', 'Zanne Devine', 'Amy Nauiokas'], 'Starring': ['Ian McKellen', 'Laura Linney', 'Hiroyuki Sanada'], 'Studio': ['Paramount Pictures']} Great acting but devoid of any action or intrigue. This is a drama about a retired Sherlock slipping into senility. Mystery fans will be disappointed. Boring but well-acted drama. Not a Sherlock mystery movie. Heist Suspense, Action, Cerebral, Intense ["A casino card dealer, desperate to pay for his daughter's life-saving surgery, teams up with a co-worker to pull off a casino heist, but as the plan falters they find themselves hijacking a bus and using the hostages as collateral."] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Scott Mann'], 'Producers': ['Randall Emmett', 'George Furla', 'Wayne Marc Godfrey', 'Robert Jones', 'Stephen Sepher', 'Alexander Tabrizi'], 'Starring': ['Dave Bautista', 'Jeffrey Dean Morgan', 'Robert De Niro']} Major plot flaws in an otherwise clever heist film. Despite that, it was worth watching (for free with Prime membership). This is not a DeNiro caliber film--but somewhat enjoyable. {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'frightening scenes', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Sam Raimi'], 'Producers': ['Tom Rosenberg', 'James Jacks', 'Gary Lucchesi', 'Robert G. Tapert', 'Rob Tapert'], 'Starring': ['Keanu Reeves', 'Cate Blanchett', 'Hilary Swank']} Superstar line-up delivers good acting in this redneck-ESP thriller. Keanu makes a good bad guy. Good ESP-crime-mystery drama {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English', 'English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Susanne Bier'], 'Producers': ['Susanne Bier', 'Khadija Alami', 'Alexei Boltho', 'Rob Bullock', 'Simon Cornwell', 'Stephen Cornwell', 'Sam Englebardt', 'José Luis Escolar', 'David Farr', 'Brian Flanagan'], 'Starring': ['Hugh Laurie', 'Tom Hiddleston', 'Nader Boussandel']} Hugh Laurie is great. A good 6-episode drama. {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jason Reitman'], 'Producers': ['David O. Sacks'], 'Starring': ['Aaron Eckhart', 'Robert Duvall', 'Katie Holmes'], 'Studio': ['20TH CENTURY FOX']} Entertaining, funny, and great sociopolitical commentary. Great, great movie for adults and teens
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to show a strong affinity for mature-rated content, particularly narratives that merge technology, hacking, and thrillers, alongside historical docu-dramas. They appreciate films that provide both entertainment and sociopolitical commentary.

- **Genre Affinity:** Recently, a more critical stance towards suspense-action films has emerged, with an emphasis on compelling storytelling. However, the user has also shown an appreciation for films that balance humor with insightful commentary, as reflected in their latest review.

- **Quality of Production:** The user has high expectations for acting and production quality, seeking a blend of strong performances and captivating narratives. They enjoy talented casts and maintain that exciting plots are essential for overall satisfaction.

- **Platform Engagement:** An enthusiastic consumer of streaming services like Amazon Prime, the user explores a broad spectrum of content, particularly those that challenge societal norms.

- **Content Advisory Awareness:** They are comfortable with adult themes such as violence and substance use, actively seeking out narratives that push boundaries.

- **Rating Behavior:** While the user's average rating remains around 4.5, they have adopted a more discerning approach, resulting in recent lower ratings for unsatisfactory plots. Their latest review highlighted strong performances while emphasizing the need for overall narrative quality.

Overall, the user's profile highlights their pursuit of high-quality dramas that offer both depth and entertainment, with a balanced approach to humor and serious themes in their content choices.
